ygData.subject: Re: weapon's for necro's
ygData.msgSnippet: Dagger of Marnek (magic) Dmg:3 Dly:30 Effects: +3 int, +15 mana necromancer only weapon. can be stored in the thrown weapon slot. i bought it, but it is a rare
ygData.messageBody:
Dagger of Marnek
(magic)
Dmg:3
Dly:30
Effects: +3 int, +15 mana
necromancer only weapon.
can be stored in the thrown weapon slot.

i bought it, but it is a rare find from Najena, and from what i hear it is a
rather high level kill.

belphenor


>From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>
>I have seen it in LF, and that was a while ago, but a Ranger was w/ me in
>lesser fay and the Named Wasp came up on his tracking, so I suspect that it
>only spawns every X hours real time and when it does it is probably killed
>FAST by any "trackers" in the area, becuase they will be aware of its
>presence long before people who rely on sight.
>
>P.S. What are the stats on the magic dagger you bought? Is it possible to
>get it at 12th lvl ish?
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 10:05 AM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] weapon's for necro's
>
>
> > From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
> >
> > i just bought the dagger of marnek =) hehe, im so happy about it. as a
> > main weapon im still using a giant snake fang tho, since the dagger is
> > mainly good for the bonuses (and, of course, if i need a magic weapon).
>the
> > great thing about it is i can keep it in a thrown slot. im pretty sure
>i
> > got a really great deal on it too (25pp)
> > has anyone run across a crook stinger? i spent a week (real time) in
>lesser
> > faydark looking for a damn named wasp, but didnt find him. in fact, a
>few
> > druids/rangers said they have been looking for it since after beta, and
> > still havent seen it. perhaps it's gone?
> >
> > belphenor
> >
> >

> > >

>and
> > >2hb
